metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9039 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: wp-login.php in WordPress before 3.7.5, 3.8.x before 3.8.5, 3.9.x before 3.9.3, and 4.x before 4.0.1 might allow remote attackers to reset passwords by leveraging access to an e-mail account that received a password-reset message.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Momen Bassel, Tanoy Bose, and Bojan Slavkovic

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
